message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,100,000. It's a valuable asset that I believe will be worth even more to you.  Let me know your thoughts!
Alice, I appreciate your offer but $1,100,000 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'd be happy to buy it for $1,050,000.  Let me know what you think.

Bob, I understand your position. While $1,050,000 is tempting, I'm still hoping to get closer to my asking price.  I'm willing to come down a bit further and offer you the product for $1,075,000. This is a fair compromise, and I'm confident this will be a great investment for you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $1,075,000 is still a little high for me. I'm willing to go up to $1,060,000.  This would be a good deal for both of us and I'm confident I can make this product work for me.
